TopicTitle: The 0.25 Waiting Room, now boarding passengers heading to Hypetown

Articles.Content: No, Magic Boulder is probably not back and he does not officially support any particular Hype Vehicle.

Why do we have to watch a normal Duna Mission like everyone done it 100 times to get to know the secret feature? Its way to late (01:47) in Germany for such boring things...

I hope there will be a summary for those who dont watch the stream.

Yeah, it's boring, what I'm doing at the same time is watching the AngryJoeShow twitch stream, he is previewing Civilization: Beyond Earth. It's way more fun and at the same time pass the time.
Supposedly, the secret feature was edited out of this picture:

"No entry purchase required on research"

Hey, that's neat.

"No entry purchase required on research"

Hey, that's neat.

What does that mean??
They are probably going to require you to buy a new part for its cost in R&D after research of said part to be able to use it.
The guy doing the stream is not going to Duna today, but he approves of the KSP community.
Also, the update is coming "Soon"

The guy doing the stream is not going to Duna today, but he approves of the KSP community.

Did something happen [mischievoussmile][/mischievoussmile]
He says that some of the guesses he's seen are completely insane and would take six months. Reveal in a few minutes.
Apparently there is a grace period for old space plane parts, where both spaceplane plus and legacy parts are going to be in game for 0.25.

Anyone doing screengrabs? I'd love to see how the stock interpetation of the new spaceplane parts look. I don't think they've all been revealed yet. I'm also curious as to what rocket the streamer used that failed to make Duna.
0.25 is being shown!!!
Get some screenshots!

And the secret feature is destructible buildings...

That's a wrap, folks!
Destructible buildings!

Is it up yet?

[youngandhighpitched]Is it up yet?!?[/youngandhighpitched]

IT IS?

Holy Kraken!
Grabbing screenshots, building destroyed.
Callled it !!!!
Destructible buildings confirmed. No joke.
Destructbale buildings! BD armory will be great for this!
Just sayin, people were guessing this before maxmaps said it wasn't guessed

Man that was guessed early.

Im with you The_Destroyer, im not going to have a space center for long.

DESTRUCTIBLE BUILDINGS CONFIRMED

WADING POOL CONFIRMED

This is awesome!
Screenshots yet?
